title: Ticket #5669: Concurency limits ignored
description:
While on site with a customer last week, I noticed that their concurrency limits were not being respected. We'd see messages in the negotiator log like: 

05/09/16 17:11:02 matchmakingAlgorithm: limit 6.000000 used 1.000000 pieLeft 5.000000
05/09/16 17:11:02 Concurrency Limit: a1.fhjlsdahgjsadhgjksdhgjkashdkj is 1.000000 of max 1.000000
05/09/16 17:11:02 Concurrency Limit a1.fhjlsdahgjsadhgjksdhgjkashdkj is 1.000000, requesting 1.000000, but cannot exceed 1.000000

but the negotiator would continue matching and jobs would execute in excess of the specified limit. Reverting from 8.4.3 to 8.4.0 fixed this issue. Unfortunately, I couldn't reproduce it this morning.
creator: bcotton
